Package edu.cmu.ri.rcommerce.filter

Provides filters for calculating position and orientation using accelerometer, magnetometer, and optionally gyroscope

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
AccelerometerListener Interface for any filter that uses accelerometer readings
GyroListener Interface for any filter that uses gyroscope readings
MagnetometerListener Interface for any filter that uses magnetometer readings
PedestrianLocalization Interface for methods of localizing pedestrians.
 

Class Summary
DoubleThresholdPeakDetector An online peak detector that accumulates data and looks for a peak when requested.
FirstDifferenceFilter A simple first difference filter meant for online use.
FirstDifferenceFilterTest  
MovingAverageFilter A moving average filter meant for online use.
MovingAverageFilterTest  
OrientationFilter Does sensor fusion of accelerometer, magnetometer, and gyroscope data to derive an orientation estimate
PedestrianLocalization_Gyro Localizes pedestrians using an OrientationFilter for heading determination and the standard deviation method for detecting movement.
PedestrianLocalization_StandardDeviation Localizes pedestrians using accelerometer and magnetometer for heading, and standard deviation method for movement detection
PedestrianLocalization_StepDetection Localizes pedestrians using accelerometer and magnetometer for heading, and step detection method for tracking movement
PositionStatisticsCalculator Can be fed PositionInfo messages, and generates useful statistics that are kept updated.
SingleThresholdPeakDetector An online peak detector that accumulates data and looks for a peak when requested.
 

Package edu.cmu.ri.rcommerce.filter Description

Provides filters for calculating position and orientation using accelerometer, magnetometer, and optionally gyroscope
